<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Despots live to amass and exploit power over others.

<title level="2" right="Creature 5">[Despot](/NPCs.aspx?ID=962)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="LE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 248</row>

**Perception** +11

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Infernal](/Languages.aspx?ID=19)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +10, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +13, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +12, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +13, [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) +13, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +12, [Warfare Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +10

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +2

**Con** +0

**Int** +4

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +4
</row>

**Persistent Lies** Any creature deceived by the despot's [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) skill believes the deception more readily on the next day. Any attempts to later attempt a Perception check against the despot's Deception DC take a -2 circumstance penalty, as do other creatures' attempts to convince the creature otherwise, such as through [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) or further Deception.

**Items**
[lesser darkvision elixir](/Equipment.aspx?ID=89), [minor healing potion](/Equipment.aspx?ID=186) (2), [Spiked Gauntlet](/Weapons.aspx?ID=11)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 19 

**Fort** +9 

**Ref** +9 

**Will** +13 

</row>

**HP** 56

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
spiked gauntlet +11 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)),
**Damage** 1d4+4 piercing

**Divine Spontaneous Spells** DC 23, attack +13
- **Cantrips (3rd)**
[Chill Touch](/Spells.aspx?ID=35), [Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Message](/Spells.aspx?ID=190), [Produce Flame](/Spells.aspx?ID=236), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280)
- **1st**
[Charm](/Spells.aspx?ID=34), [Command](/Spells.aspx?ID=45), [Fear](/Spells.aspx?ID=110), [Sanctuary](/Spells.aspx?ID=266) (4 slots)
- **2nd**
[Calm Emotions](/Spells.aspx?ID=31), [Flaming Sphere](/Spells.aspx?ID=121), [See Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=271), [Undetectable Alignment](/Spells.aspx?ID=348)
- **3rd**
[Chilling Darkness](/Spells.aspx?ID=36), [Enthrall](/Spells.aspx?ID=104), [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) (4 slots)

**Sorcerer Bloodline Spells** DC 22, 1 Focus Point
- **3rd**
[Diabolic Edict](/Spells.aspx?ID=498)

**Bloodline Magic**   When the despot casts a bloodline spell, [_enthrall_](/Spells.aspx?ID=104), [_flaming sphere_](/Spells.aspx?ID=121), or [_charm_](/Spells.aspx?ID=34), either a target takes 1 fire damage per spell level, or the despot gains a +1 status bonus to [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) checks for 1 round.

**Dangerous Sorcery**   When the despot Casts a Spell from a spell slot, if the spell deals damage and doesn't have a duration, the despot gains a status bonus equal to the spell's level to that spell's damage.

</column>
